com.samsung.android.sdk.composer.document

Class SpenContentHandWriting

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.composer.document.SpenContentBase
      • com.samsung.android.sdk.composer.document.SpenContentHandWriting

  • public class SpenContentHandWriting
extends SpenContentBase
    ContentHandWriting class

    A ContentHandWriting class represents handwriting content. It has a SpenNoteDoc, so you can use this by getNoteDoc().
    Since:
    5.0.0

      • createNoteDoc

        public SpenNoteDoc createNoteDoc(Context context,
                                 int width,
                                 int height)
                          throws IOException
        Create NoteDoc instance for handwriting canvas.
        Parameters:
        context - context.
        width - NoteDoc width.
        height - NoteDoc height.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Thrown if context is null.
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if handwriting canvas already contain the NoteDoc instance.
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if width or height less than 32.
        IOException
        Since:
        5.0.0
